submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        hor= 1
        vert= 1
        tot= 0
        h_index = 0
        v_index = 0
    
        while h_index < len(horizontalCut) and v_index < len(verticalCut):
            if horizontalCut[h_index] > verticalCut[v_index]:
                tot += horizontalCut[h_index] * vert
                hor+= 1
                h_index += 1
            else:
                tot+= verticalCut[v_index] * hor
                vert += 1
                v_index += 1
 
        while h_index < len(horizontalCut):
            tot+= horizontalCut[h_index] * vert
            hor += 1
            h_index += 1
        while v_index < len(verticalCut):
            tot += verticalCut[v_index] * hor
            vert += 1
            v_index += 1
        return tot
